I'm not sure why few people like the first one better. I think the second is funnier and better (more) songs. In the first one Bella's keep singing the same "Ace of base" song over and over till they finally change it up for the final competition. I was bit tired of listening to the same song mash up. I love the final song in the second one "you're my flashlight". Both movies are great and can't wait for the third one to come out.
